name: Toolkits Addons
author: Ashathemes

sections.description:
Toolkits Addons is a nice wordpress plugin for elementor.Toolkits Addons have 12 free widgets & 20 features. This plugin will enable elementor addons on your wordpress theme. You can use this plugin any wordpress theme. If you want to get best performance please active our theme. Toolkits Addons is one of the most user friendly wordpress plugin. So try Toolkits Elementor Addon to create Beautiful Elementor Websites

Elementor Widgets

  • Slider Addon
  • Bannar Addon
  • Service Addon
  • Skill Addon
  • Icon Addon
  • Carousel Addon
  • Parallax Addon
  • Popular Posts Addon
  • Call To Action Addon
  • Testimonial Addon
  • Pricing Table Addon
  • Count Box Addon

12 Free Elementor Widgets Are Available in the Toolkits Addon Free

  • Slider – Now you can create sliders with our amazing Slider Widget. And just like our other widgets, there are lots of customization options for you. You can create outstanding slider items for free.
  • Pricing Table – Now you can create pricing table with our amazing Pricing Table Widget. And just like our other widgets, there are lots of customization options for you. You can create outstanding pricing table items for free.
  • Carousel – Create interesting images and text carousels using our Elementor carousel widget which comes with a lot of options. So try this Elementor carousel widget now for free.
  • Service – Now you can create Service with our amazing Service Widget. And just like our other widgets, there are lots of customization options for you. You can create outstanding service items for free.
  • Popular Posts – List any post elegantly using this elementor widget displaying them in a creative and innovative manner with multiple options to play with. So try the free elementor popular post widget to display your post content in a list view.
  • Testimonial – Create beautiful testimonial sections with different look-and-feels using the Testimonial widget. Try Elementor Testimonial Widget to make a trustworthy product or website.
  • Skill – Create beautiful Skill sections with different look-and-feels using the Skill widget. Try Elementor Skill Widget to make a skill section in your website.
  • Bannar – Create beautiful Website Bannar sections with different look-and-feels using the Bannar widget. Try Elementor Bannar Widget to make a trustworthy product or website.
  • Count Box – Now you can create Count Section with our amazing Count Box Widget. And just like our other widgets, there are lots of customization options for you. You can create outstanding Count items for free.
  • Icon Box – Icon Box widget is a version of Font-Awesome icon but comes with powerful display features. Perfect for showcasing interesting information to your users in various styles. You can create outstanding Icon items for free.
  • Action – You can use Action widgets Perfectly for showcasing interesting information to your users in various styles. You can create outstanding Call to Action items for free.
  • Parallax – You can use Parallax widgets for creating parallax section in your websties.You can create outstanding Parallax items for free.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

First things first, thank you for choosing our Toolkits Addons!

You can install the plugin one of two ways:

Install using FTP

  • Unzip the toolkits-addons.zip file locally to your machine
  • Connect to your FTP area using your preferred FTP package
  • Upload the toolkits-addons.zip folder that you extracted from the zip file to the plugin folder of your WordPress installation (wp-content -> plugin)
  • Go to plugin and activate Toolkits Addons.

Install by WordPress (recommended)

  • Login to your WordPress admin area.
  • Navigate to plugin and click the Add New button at the top.
  • Click the Upload plugin button at the top.
  • Click the Choose File button and locate the toolkits-addons.zip file on your machine and click the Install Now button.
  • On the basis the plugin installs correctly, click the Activate link.
